Container.Name: zigbee2mqtt
Container.Overview: Zigbee to MQTT bridge using zigbee-shepherd allows you to use your Zigbee devices without the vendors bridge or gateway. It bridges events and allows you to control your Zigbee devices via MQTT. In this way you can integrate your Zigbee devices with whatever smart home infrastructure you are using.

Config.Name: Zigbee module
Config.Description: Path to zigbee module, preferably serial/by-id
